mapper.select: SELECT pr.program_reservation_no programReservationNo, customer_attendance_enter_time customerAttendanceEnterTime, pd.program_date programDate FROM program_reservation pr INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no LEFT OUTER JOIN customer_attendance ca ON ca.program_reservation_no = pr.program_reservation_no

SELECT pd.program_date programDate, pr.program_reservation_no AS programReservationNo FROM program_reservation pr INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pd.program_date_no = pr.program_date_no INNER JOIN payment p ON p.payment_no = pr.payment_no LEFT OUTER JOIN customer_attendance ca ON pr.program_reservation_no = ca.program_reservation_no WHERE ca.customer_attendance_no IS NULL AND p.customer_no = #{customerNo} AND pd.program_date = DATE(NOW())

SELECT ca.customer_attendance_no AS customerAttendanceNo, ca.customer_attendance_enter_time AS customerAttendanceEnterTime, pro.program_name AS programName, b.branch_name AS branchName, n.reviewNo AS reviewNo FROM customer_attendance ca INNER JOIN program_reservation pr ON ca.program_reservation_no = pr.program_reservation_no INNER JOIN payment p ON p.payment_no = pr.payment_no INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program pro ON pro.program_no = pd.program_no INNER JOIN branch b ON b.branch_no = pr.branch_no LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT review_no AS reviewNo, customer_attendance_no AS customerAttendanceNo FROM review) n ON ca.customer_attendance_no = n.customerAttendanceNo WHERE p.customer_no = #{customerNo} AND n.reviewNo IS NULL ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 0,5
